summary: Urtica dioica, Taraxacum officinale, Calea integrifolia and Caesalpinia pulcherrima are widely used all over the world for treatment of different illnesses. these plants are traditionally used to alleviate or counteract rheumatism and inflammatory muscle diseases. oica and T. officinale methanolic extracts with anti-dengue activity were found. several recognized molecules have demonstrated activity against other viral species.
